author: sky.cactus
content: <@104006934562107392> Can we make it so moving to withdrawn or stagnant doesn't require editor approval *unless* the EIP is in Final already?

author: sky.cactus
content: It should just require author approval (stagnant) or author approval/submission (withdrawn).

author: sky.cactus
content:
